Types of Airsoft Guns: Spring guns are manual powered Airsoft guns where you fire each round by pulling the bolt into the locking position (like most sniper rifles). They are generally cheaper and meant as collectors' items. Gas guns are powered by CO2 cartridge, propane adapter or green gas.
